meanings.sent1: After playing outside all day, I felt tireder than ever before.
meanings.sent2: She looked tireder than usual after staying up late studying.
meanings.sent3: The puppy was tireder than a sloth after chasing its tail all afternoon.
meanings.sent4: His mind was tireder than an old engine trying to start in the cold.
meanings.sent5: The long hike left me feeling tireder than I had ever felt in my life.

meanings.definition: More exhausted than someone or something else
meanings.sent1: She was tireder than her brother after running the marathon.
meanings.sent2: The old car was tireder than the new one after the long road trip.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked tireder than the mouse it was chasing around the house.
meanings.sent4: His voice sounded tireder than a worn-out record repeating the same song.
meanings.sent5: The runner was tireder than all the other competitors at the finish line.
